meta.title: CoVid-19 Update 4/3/20 - Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School

meta.content: CoVid-19 Update 4/3/20 - Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School

Good Morning Old Colony Families and Community, Please see the letter linked here for the Old Colony’s April 3, 2020 CoVid-19 update. Wishing you health and peace of mind. Sincerely, Aaron L. Polansky, Superintendent-Director Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School #WeAreOC Connect. Create. Inspire.
Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School

div.p: Good Morning Old Colony Families and Community,
Please see the letter linked here for the Old Colony’s April 3, 2020 CoVid-19 update.
Wishing you health and peace of mind.
Aaron L. Polansky, Superintendent-Director Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School
